channel.title: Stats Help
channel.description:
Hello.
On my server when I'm maxed out all 99 stats and so forth, why does my combat remain at 185. Does anyone have an idea as to where abouts I can change that to 126 please.
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Stats Help
item.dc:creator: @iceburster iceburster
item.description:
@iceburster wrote:

Try opening your server file and find combat 185, change the “185” to “126” and compile.

Read full topic
